title: Please help me file a ticket to Riot Support ( I don't know which option I need to choose)
body:
Hi guys, today I received an email asking me about confirming a password change on my account, which I didn't make, worried I opened my LoL account only to see I was hacked, stripped from most of my RP (the hacker gifted 4 skins to a person, which may be him/herself) some IP, he bought Lee Sin in my account, deleted all my friends and erased all my runes and masteries pages, then proceed to play 7 of the 10 ranked promotions all lost, this seems very odd as why someone would lose time playing in the account you are hacking.

I already changed my password so I hope this stops right here, now, which option do I need to choose to file a ticket for this, I'm going for "I need help recovering my account" but I'm not 100% sure since I have access to my account right now.

Thanks in advance for your response and time.

replies.body:
You're correct in selecting the "recovery" category. We'll have to verify you're not the hacker or someone else before we can assist you in sorting out changes on your account.

If you run into further issues submitting your ticket, just let me know!
That sounds like the right option in a case like this.
